Detailed Description

Defines CrossDisplay-specific public functions on Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms.

This file contains all CrossDisplay-related functions exposed by ADL for public use on Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms.
